title: The Ultimate Russian Learning Pack (2014)
description:
Hi, this torrent is based on The Ultimate Russian Learning Pack (Including Supplements). If you have it you probably don't need this.
I tried to reduce the size of the original torrent, keeping the most important resources, adding some new ones, and now the size is only 12.2 GB.
If you've never downloaded a Russian language learning pack before, this is definitely the one to get!

The torrent is divided into 16 folders:

00 Book List
01 Beginner's Courses
02 Grammar Workbooks
03 Graded Readers, Folk Tales
04 Disney Fairy Tales
05 Intermediate-Advanced Courses
06 Reference Grammars, Usage
07 Russian Verbs
08 Verbal Aspect
09 Verbs of Motion
10 Vocabulary, Word Formation
11 Russian Case System
12 Syntax
13 Training Tests in Russian
14 Phrasebooks, Dictionaries
15 Society, Culture, History, Tourism
